column1: Les pompiers ont été appelés pour secourir un chiot perdu après être resté coincé à 15 m au-dessus du sol sur une corniche instable dans une carrière  translates into English as:
column2: Fire crews called to rescue lost puppy after she got stuck 50ft above the ground on precarious ledge in a quarry
column3: They were called to rescue a dog that was trapped in a cave after being stuck at 15 m above the ground on a unstable slope.

column1: A l'issue d'une nouvelle mission infructueuse dans le pays, le FMI a constaté cette semaine que "les importants besoins en financement extérieur" constituaient "une vulnérabilité", tout en relevant "des signes d'amélioration économique".  translates into English as:
column2: Following a fruitless mission to the country, the IMF noted this week that "the significant need for external finance" represented "a weakness", even though there were "signs of economic improvement".
column3: Despite the significant external financing needs, the country is still vulnerable to external shocks.

column1: La question fait l'objet d'une réglementation qui oblige les exploitants d'aéronefs à garantir le maintien de la sécurité en permanence et les passagers à respecter les consignes de sécurité données par les membres d'équipage.  translates into English as:

column1: L'idée était de montrer le moment précédant l'avènement de Greenwich village, ce quartier de New York appelé à devenir "l'épicentre de l'essor de la musique folk qui engendrerait des stars internationales" comme l'écrit le journaliste Elijah Wald, ami de Van Ronk.  translates into English as:
column2: The idea was to portray the moment preceding the advent of Greenwich Village, the New York district destined to become "the epicentre of the folk music boom that created international stars", according to the journalist Elijah Wald, a friend of Van Ronk.
column3: When the first signs of Greenwich Village began to appear, it was the beginning of the rise of folk music that would lead to international stars such as Elijah Wald.

column1: L'unité chargée de la criminalité grave et organisée du Lancashire a mené l'enquête sur M. Ditta, qui a été reconnu coupable des trois chefs d'accusation de possession de cocaïne et maintenant d'entrave à la justice, témoignant de son engagement à poursuivre les criminels en justice.  translates into English as:
column2: Lancashire's Serious and Organised Crime Unit led the investigation into Mr Ditta which has also seen him convicted of three counts of possession of cocaine and now perverting the course of justice, demonstrating our commitment to bringing criminals to justice.
column3: The Lancashire Police have been investigating the case of M. Ditta, who was convicted of the three charges of possession of cocaine and now obstructing justice, and who has pledged to continue to prosecute criminals in court.
